author: brekke
msg: Moved the legacy build file to build-legacy.xml and moved the build-maven.xml
to be the default build ( build.xml ).  The cactus configuration files were
updated since maven is not the default build system.  The XMLRPC iutest
had to be updated, but it isn't even being run at this time ( maybe we should
nuke it ).  I posted a little blurb in the README.txt about the builds with
The legacy build is still functional except for the test-servlet target.

author: jmcnally
msg: remove code that was closing the response writer.  There is not much
benefit in doing so, and it can cause problems.  E.g.  Another servlet
includes the Turbine servlet using a RequestDispatcher.  If that
servlet then tries to add more content to the response, it will fail.
